short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join Tony Tony Chopper's cheerful adventures with vibrant visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embark on an adventurous journey with Tony Tony Chopper, the beloved reindeer from One Piece, in this lively live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A cheerful interface inspired by Chopper’s adorable and quirky personality, featuring vibrant blue, pink, and brown tones that reflect his iconic look.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a fun display that captures Chopper’s playful spirit.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into One Piece-themed mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as resourceful and versatile as Chopper himself.
